postReview.title: West Ham 1-2 Aston Villa: Duran denies Lopetegui first point in charge of Hammers
postReview.description: Julen Lopetegui's start at West Ham did not go to plan after Jhon Duran's strike sealed a late 2-1 win for Aston Villa on Saturday.

preReview.title: Lopetegui 'not putting limits' on West Ham dreams ahead of Aston Villa opener
preReview.description: West Ham are being dared to dream by manager Julen Lopetegui, starting against Aston Villa on Saturday in their Premier League opener.

QAData.question: Who won between West Ham United and Aston Villa on Sat, 17 Aug 2024 16:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Aston Villa won 2–1 over West Ham United on Sat, 17 Aug 2024 16:30:00 GMT.
